item.title: Exclusive: Child Abusers Top ICE’s Latest List Of ‘Worst Of The Worst’ Illegal Aliens
item.description: 'These are the type of sickos we are getting OUT of our neighborhoods,' said DHS's Tricia McLaughlin in a statement to The Federalist.

item.title: Country Singer Jeffrey Steele’s New Song Gives ‘A Voice’ To The Forgotten American
item.description: 'I hope this song becomes a voice not only for people speaking up for others and themselves, but for these young kids and these young artists,' Steele...

item.title: Leftists Play-Acting At Revolution Are Mad The Cops Won’t Play Along
item.description: Word people perform words at doing-things people, while the doing-things people keep doing things, disregarding the words.

item.title: Parents Must Actively Opt Out Of Turning Their Kids Into Digital Age Zombies
item.description: The highest civic skill in the digital age is not coding or content creation, but the ability to look away.

item.title: The Left Will Never Forgive Renee Good (Or Anyone Else) For Being White
item.description: Leftism is the only ideology that demands total subjugation and will still treat you like garbage after you die for it.
